trans-unit.source: Tuples are compared in an "element-wise" manner; the first element of this tuple is compared with the first one of other using the #<=> operator, then each of the second elements, etc. As soon as the result of any such comparison is non-zero (i.e. the two corresponding elements are not equal), that result is returned for the whole tuple comparison.
trans-unit.target: 元组以“元素方式”进行比较；使用 #<=> 运算符将该元组的第一个元素与其他第一个元素进行比较，然后将每个第二个元素进行比较，依此类推。一旦任何这样的比较结果为非零（即两个对应的元素）不相等），则返回整个元组比较的结果。

trans-unit.source: UDP is a very simple protocol. Messages, so called datagrams, are sent to other hosts on an IP network without the need to set up special transmission channels or data paths beforehand. The UDP socket only needs to be opened for communication. It listens for incoming messages and sends outgoing messages on request.
trans-unit.target: UDP是一个非常简单的协议。信息,即所谓的数据报,在IP网络上发送给其他主机,而不需要事先设置特殊的传输通道或数据路径。只需要打开UDP套接字就可以进行通信。它监听传入的消息,并按要求发送传出的消息。

trans-unit.source: UDP runs on top of the Internet Protocol (IP) and was developed for applications that do not require reliability, acknowledgement, or flow control features at the transport layer. This simple protocol provides transport layer addressing in the form of UDP ports and an optional checksum capability.
trans-unit.target: UDP运行在互联网协议(IP)之上,是为不需要传输层的可靠性、确认或流量控制功能的应用而开发的。这个简单的协议以UDP端口和可选的校验功能的形式提供传输层寻址。

trans-unit.source: We can't do much with person, so let's add some concepts to it. A Person has a name and an age. We will store this information in instance variables, which are always prefixed with an at (@) character. We also want a Person to come into existence with a name of our choice and an age of zero. We code the "come into existence" part with a special initialize method, which is normally called a constructor:

trans-unit.source: When a computation-intensive task has none or only rare IO operations, a fiber should explicitly offer to yield execution from time to time using Fiber.yield to break up tight loops. The frequency of this call depends on the application and concurrency model.
trans-unit.target: 当计算密集型任务没有或只有很少的IO操作时，光纤应使用 Fiber.yield 明确提供以不时产生执行，以打破紧密的循环。调用的频率取决于应用程序和并发模型。

trans-unit.source: When a connection is established it usually means opening a TCP connection or Socket. The socket will handle one statement at a time. If a program needs to perform many queries simultaneously, or if it handles concurrent requests that aim to use a database, it will need more than one active connection.
trans-unit.target: 当一个连接建立时,通常意味着打开一个TCP连接或Socket。Socket一次只处理一条语句。如果一个程序需要同时执行许多查询,或者处理以使用数据库为目的的并发请求,它将需要一个以上的活动连接。

trans-unit.source: When a database is opened with crystal-db there is already a connection pool working. DB.open returns a DB::Database object which manages the whole connection pool and not just a single connection.
trans-unit.target: 使用 crystal-db 打开数据库时，已经有一个连接池在工作。 DB.open 返回一个 DB::Database 对象，该对象管理整个连接池，而不仅仅是一个连接。

trans-unit.source: When a literal is assigned to an instance variable, the literal's type is added to the set. All literals have an associated type.
trans-unit.target: 将文字分配给实例变量后，文字的类型将添加到集合中。所有文字都有关联的类型。

trans-unit.source: When a macro is invoked you can access the current scope, or type, with a special instance variable: @type. The type of this variable is TypeNode, which gives you access to type information at compile time.
trans-unit.target: 调用宏时，您可以使用特殊的实例变量 @type 访问当前作用域或类型。此变量的类型为 TypeNode ，它使您可以在编译时访问类型信息。

trans-unit.source: When a macro is invoked you can access the method, the macro is in with a special instance variable: @def. The type of this variable is Def unless the macro is outside of a method, in this case it's NilLiteral.
trans-unit.target: 调用宏时，您可以访问该方法，该宏带有特殊的实例变量： @def 。除非宏在方法外部，否则此变量的类型为 Def ，在这种情况下为 NilLiteral 。

trans-unit.source: When invoking a method on a union type, the language checks that the method exists and can be resolved (typed) for each type in the union. For this reason, adding instance methods to Union makes no sense and has no effect. However, adding class method to Union is possible and can be useful. One example is parsing JSON into one of many possible types.
trans-unit.target: 在联合类型上调用方法时，语言会检查该方法是否存在，并且可以为联合中的每种类型解析（键入）该方法。因此，将实例方法添加到 Union 毫无意义，也没有效果。但是，可以将类方法添加到 Union 中,并且可能很有用。一个示例是将 JSON 解析为许多可能的类型之一。

trans-unit.source: When parsing a request, the server keeps track of the amount of total bytes consumed for all headers (including line breaks). If combined byte size of all headers is larger than the permitted size, the server responds with the status code 432 Request Header Fields Too Large (see HTTP::Status::REQUEST_HEADER_FIELDS_TOO_LARGE).
trans-unit.target: 解析请求时，服务器会跟踪所有标头（包括换行符）消耗的总字节数。如果所有标头的总字节大小大于允许的大小，则服务器将以状态码 432 Request Header Fields Too Large （请参阅 HTTP::Status::REQUEST_HEADER_FIELDS_TOO_LARGE ）进行响应。

trans-unit.source: When working with databases, it is common to need to group operations in such a way that if one fails, then we can go back to the latest safe state. This solution is described in the transaction paradigm, and is implemented by most database engines as it is necessary to meet ACID properties (Atomicity, Consistency, Isolation, Durability) ACID
trans-unit.target: 在使用数据库时，通常需要以某种方式对操作进行分组，如果操作失败，则可以返回到最新的安全状态。此溶液在中描述了交易范式，并且通过大多数数据库引擎实现，因为它是要满足ACID属性（原子性，一致性，隔离性和持久性）ACID

trans-unit.source: With Colorize you can change the fore- and background colors and text decorations when rendering text on terminals supporting ANSI escape codes. It adds the colorize method to Object and thus all classes as its main interface, which calls to_s and surrounds it with the necessary escape codes when it comes to obtaining a string representation of the object.
trans-unit.target: 使用Colorize，可以在支持ANSI转义码的终端上渲染文本时更改前景色和背景色以及文字装饰。它将 colorize 方法添加到 Object 并因此将所有类添加为其对象的主接口，该方法调用 to_s 并在获取对象的字符串表示形式时将其用必要的转义代码包围。

trans-unit.target: 对于命名元组的文字,你不能创建一个空的命名元组。这个方法没有这个限制,这使得它在宏和通用代码中特别有用。

trans-unit.source: With the toggle method you can temporarily disable adding the escape codes. Settings of the instance are preserved however and can be turned back on later:
trans-unit.target: 使用 toggle 方法，您可以暂时禁用添加转义码。但是，实例的设置会保留下来，以后可以重新打开：

trans-unit.source: With these methods it is possible to express expected traces in either a strict or loose way, while checking ordering.
trans-unit.target: 通过这些方法,可以用严格或宽松的方式表达预期的痕迹,同时检查排序。

trans-unit.source: Yields each char for the upcase equivalent of this char.
trans-unit.target: 产生每个字符的大写等价物。

trans-unit.source: Yields each char in this string to the block, returns the number of times the block returned a truthy value.
trans-unit.target: 将这个字符串中的每一个char交给块,返回块返回truthhy值的次数。

trans-unit.source: Yields each char in this string to the block.
trans-unit.target: 将此字符串中的每一个字符交给块。

trans-unit.source: Yields each char in this string to the block. Returns a new String with all characters for which the block returned a truthy value removed.
trans-unit.target: 将此字符串中的每个字符输出到块。返回一个新的 String ，其中删除了该块返回真值的所有字符。

trans-unit.source: Yields each char in this string to the block. Returns a new String, that has all characters removed, that were the same as the previous one and for which the given block returned a truthy value.
trans-unit.target: 将此字符串中的每个字符输出到块。返回一个新的 String ，该字符串删除了所有与上一个字符相同的字符，并且给定的块返回了真实值。

trans-unit.source: Yields each character and its index in the string to the block.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串中的每个字符和它的索引提供给块。

trans-unit.source: Yields each character in the string to the block.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串中的每一个字符交给块。

trans-unit.source: Yields each codepoint to the block.
trans-unit.target: 将每个代码点让给该块。

trans-unit.source: Yields each component of this path as a String.
trans-unit.target: 将此路径的每个组件生成为 String 。

trans-unit.source: Yields each element in this iterator together with its index.
trans-unit.target: 产生迭代器中的每个元素及其索引。

trans-unit.source: Yields each element of the set, and returns self.
trans-unit.target: 产生集合的每个元素，并返回 self 。

trans-unit.source: Yields each entry in the zip to the given block.
trans-unit.target: 将压缩包中的每一个条目转为给定区块。

trans-unit.source: Yields each index of self to the given block and then assigns the block's value in that position.
trans-unit.target: 将 self 每个索引产生到给定的块，然后在该位置分配块的值。

trans-unit.source: Yields each index of self to the given block and then assigns the block's value in that position. Returns self.
trans-unit.target: 将 self 每个索引产生到给定的块，然后在该位置分配块的值。返回 self 。

trans-unit.source: Yields each index of self, in the given range, to the given block and then assigns the block's value in that position.
trans-unit.target: 将给定范围内的 self 的每个索引生成到给定的块，然后在该位置分配该块的值。

trans-unit.source: Yields each index of self, in the given range, to the given block and then assigns the block's value in that position. Returns self.
trans-unit.target: 将给定范围内的 self 的每个索引生成到给定的块，然后在该位置分配该块的值。返回 self 。

trans-unit.source: Yields each index of self, starting at from and just count times, to the given block and then assigns the block's value in that position.
trans-unit.target: 从给定的块开始（仅从计数开始）就得出 self 的每个索引，然后在该位置分配该块的值。

trans-unit.source: Yields each index of self, starting at from and just count times, to the given block and then assigns the block's value in that position. Returns self.
trans-unit.target: 从给定的块开始（仅从计数开始）就得出 self 的每个索引，然后在该位置分配该块的值。返回 self 。

trans-unit.source: Yields each index of self, starting at from, to the given block and then assigns the block's value in that position.
trans-unit.target: 得到的每个索引 self ，开始于从，为给定的块，然后在该位置分配块的值。

trans-unit.source: Yields each index of self, starting at from, to the given block and then assigns the block's value in that position. Returns self.
trans-unit.target: 得到的每个索引 self ，开始于从，为给定的块，然后在该位置分配块的值。返回 self 。

trans-unit.source: Yields each item in this deque, from first to last.
trans-unit.target: 从第一个到最后一个,产生这个deque中的每个项目。

trans-unit.source: Yields each key and value in this named tuple.
trans-unit.target: 产生这个命名元组中的每个键和值。

trans-unit.source: Yields each key and value, together with an index starting at offset, in this named tuple.
trans-unit.target: 在此命名元组中，产生每个键和值以及从offset开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Yields each key in this named tuple.
trans-unit.target: 产生这个命名元组中的每个键。

trans-unit.source: Yields each key-value pair in this mapping.
trans-unit.target: 产生该映射中的每个键值对。

trans-unit.source: Yields each line in filename to the given block.
trans-unit.target: 将文件名中的每一行输出到给定的块。

trans-unit.source: Yields each of a CSV's rows as an Array(String).
trans-unit.target: 将CSV的每一行作为 Array(String) 。

trans-unit.source: Yields each of the bytes of this char as encoded by UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: 产生这个字符的每一个字节,用UTF-8编码。

trans-unit.source: Yields each of the elements in this tuple in reverse order.
trans-unit.target: 按相反的顺序产生这个元组中的每个元素。

trans-unit.source: Yields each of the elements in this tuple.
trans-unit.target: 产生这个元组中的每个元素。

trans-unit.source: Yields each of the remaining rows as an Array(String).
trans-unit.target: 将其余各行作为 Array(String) 。

trans-unit.source: Yields each parent of this path beginning with the topmost parent.
trans-unit.target: 产生这个路径的每个父节点,从最上面的父节点开始。

trans-unit.source: Yields each possible Addrinfo resolution since a domain may resolve to many IP. Implementations are supposed to try all the addresses until the socket is connected (or bound) or there are no addresses to try anymore.
trans-unit.target: 由于域可以解析为多个IP，因此会产生每种可能的 Addrinfo 分辨率。实现应该尝试所有地址，直到套接字已连接（或绑定）或没有地址可以尝试为止。

trans-unit.source: Yields each possible permutation of size of self.
trans-unit.target: 产生 self 大小的每个可能排列。

trans-unit.source: Yields each value in this named tuple.
trans-unit.target: 产生这个命名元组中的每个值。

trans-unit.source: Yields elements of self and others in tandem to the given block.
trans-unit.target: 将 self 和他人的要素串联到给定的区块中。

trans-unit.source: Yields successive characters from #string starting from #pos.
trans-unit.target: 从 #string 开始，从 #pos 产生连续字符。

trans-unit.source: Yields the current element at the given index and updates the value at the given index with the block's value.
trans-unit.target: 在给定索引处屈服当前元素，并使用块的值更新给定索引处的值。

trans-unit.source: Yields the current element at the given index and updates the value at the given index with the block's value. Raises IndexError if trying to set an element outside the array's range.
trans-unit.target: 在给定索引处屈服当前元素，并使用块的值更新给定索引处的值。如果尝试设置超出数组范围的元素，则引发 IndexError 。

trans-unit.source: Yields to the scheduler and allows it to swap execution to other waiting fibers.
trans-unit.target: 屈服于调度器,并允许它将执行交换给其他等待的光纤。

trans-unit.source: You also disable all protections with unchecked. Attempting to re-lock the mutex from the same fiber will deadlock. Any fiber can unlock the mutex, even if it wasn't previously locked.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过 unchecked 禁用所有保护。尝试从同一根光纤重新锁定互斥锁将导致死锁。任何光纤都可以解锁互斥锁，即使之前未锁定过也是如此。

trans-unit.source: You can also make a struct behave like a C union (this can be pretty unsafe):
trans-unit.target: 你也可以让一个结构表现得像一个C联盟(这可能很不安全)。

trans-unit.source: You can also pass an RGB color to colorize:
trans-unit.target: 您还可以传递RGB颜色进行 colorize ：

trans-unit.source: You can also rescue multiple exception types at once by specifying a union type:
trans-unit.target: 您也可以通过指定一个联合类型来同时拯救多个异常类型。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the Entry's time (which is Time.utc by default) and extra data before adding it to the zip stream.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以设置条目的时间（默认情况下为 Time.utc ）和其他数据，然后再将其添加到zip流中。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the Entry's time (which is Time.utc by default) and extra data before adding it to the zip stream.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以设置条目的时间（默认情况下为 Time.utc ）和其他数据，然后再将其添加到zip流中。

trans-unit.target: 你也可以通过传递一个方法调用而不是一个块来产生。为了理解为什么这很有用,让我们看看这个例子。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify many fields of the same type:
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定同一类型的多个字段。

trans-unit.source: You can also use "../" to access parent directories relative to the current file, so require "../../foo/bar" works as well.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用“ ../”来访问相对于当前文件的父目录，因此 require "../../foo/bar" 正常工作。

trans-unit.source: You can also use an OAuth2::Session to automatically refresh expired tokens before each request.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用 OAuth2::Session 在每个请求之前自动刷新过期的令牌。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the &block syntax to forward blocks, but then you have to at least specify the input types, and the generated code will involve closures and will be slower:

trans-unit.source: You can compile and run specs from folder trees, individual files or specific lines in a file.
trans-unit.target: 您可以从文件夹树、单个文件或文件中的特定行编译和运行规格。

trans-unit.source: You can compile and run specs from folder trees, individual files, or specific lines in a file. If the specified line is the beginning of a describe or context section, all specs inside that group are run.
trans-unit.target: 您可以从文件夹树，单个文件或文件中的特定行编译并运行规范。如果指定的行是 describe 或 context 部分的开头，则将运行该组内的所有规范。

trans-unit.source: You can invoke a fixed subset of methods on AST nodes at compile-time. These methods are documented in a fictitious Crystal::Macros module.
